description:
To Buy Joey Cover Insurance on various conditions like age and number of travellers and validate
the confirmation page against data displayed on Q2, Q3 pages.

In order to Buy Joey Cover from kangoCover Website as a customer, I want to validate confirm page against
Q2 and Q3 Pages contents as per customer selection for various age group and Duration
name: JOEY COVER -

steps.name: I am on KangoCover WebSite Home Page

elements.name: To Buy "Winter Sports Cover" and "Sports and Activity Cover" from Joey Cover and validate values from Q2, Q3

steps.name: I enter "India" as my destination
I enter my Return Dates as "30" days from today
I enter "64" as my Age
I click on GetQuote
I validate Q2 Page
I select "L1-Joey Cover" and click next step
I validate Q2A Page
I validate that standard Excess is "$250"
I select "Double the Standard Excess" Addon
I select "Winter Sports Cover" Addon
I select "Sports & Activity Cover" Addon
I validate that Standard Excess value is doubled
I validate that Additional Premium Amount adds on to the Current Quote Amount
I click on Next Step on Q2A Page
I enter customer details for "64" years
I enter creditcard details for Payment
I agree to terms and conditions
I am on KangoCover WebSite Home Page
